publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-370 Brian Adam: Intergrated Detoxification and Rehabilitation Centre in North East—That the Parliament supports the Aberdeen Independent campaign for an integrated detoxification and rehabilitation centre to tackle the North East’s drug crisis. Supported by: Irene McGugan*, Richard Lochhead*, Shona Robison*
S1M-370 Intergrated Detoxification and Rehabilitation Centre in North East (lodged on 8 December 1999) Colin Campbell*

S1M-370 Brian Adam: Intergrated Detoxification and Rehabilitation Centre in North East—That the Parliament supports the Aberdeen Independent campaign for an integrated detoxification and rehabilitation centre to tackle the North East’s drug crisis. Supported by: Irene McGugan, Richard Lochhead, Shona Robison, Colin Campbell
